title: FS: 1907 Morgan Stationery Red Belt 'A Home Run'...SOLD
author: Kzoo

posts.post_title: FS: 1907 Morgan Stationery Red Belt 'A Home Run'...SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is this 1907 Morgan Stationery Red Belt 'A Home Run' postcard. The postcard is used and postmarked 1909. The surface doesn't have any noticeable creases, but the writing and postmarks on the back left indentations that can be seen on the front. Cool postcard with good color. 

$SOLD. Payment via PayPal 'gift' preferred. PM me with questions or to purchase. Thanks............Matt
I would like to buy this card. PM sent.
